| THES_W = 351â400
}} 'The University of Texas at San Antonio' ('UTSA' The terms "Texas-San
Antonio" and "UT-San Antonio" are discouraged. "[https://www.utsa.edu/identity/visual-
style/index.html University Name | Identity Guidelines. UTSA.edu. Retrieved July
5, 2013. ) is a state research university in San Antonio, Texas, United
States. With 30,968 students, it is the largest university in San Antonio and
the eighth-largest in the state of Texas. Its three
campuses span over 747 acres of land, with its main campus being the largest in
the University of Texas System. ''UTSA holds the largest campus of the
universities in the UT System according to USNWR: [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-
colleges/university-of-texasarlington-3656 UT Arlington profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-
colleges/university-of-texas-3658 UT Austin profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-
colleges/university-of-texas-brownsville-30646 UTB profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-
colleges/university-of-texas-dallas-9741 UT Dallas profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-colleges/utep-
3661 UTEP profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-colleges/utsa-
10115/academics UTSA profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-colleges/ut-
tyler-11163 UT Tyler profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-colleges/utpb-
9930 UTPB profile] [http://colleges.usnews.rankingsandreviews.com/best-colleges/utpa-
3599 UTPA profile] UTSA offers a wide array of academic studies, with 133
undergraduate, 51 graduate and 24 doctoral programs. "[http://utsa.edu/about/glance/ Fast Facts]". About UTSA. Retrieved
September 3, 2012. In 2012 and 2013, it was selected by Times Higher
Education as one of the best universities in the world under 50 years old. "[http://www.mysanantonio.com/news/education/article/UTSA-ranked-among-
best-young-universities-3630734.php UTSA ranked among best young universities]".
My San Antonio. Retrieved July 5, 2012. [http://tpr.org/post/utsa-receives-global-ranking-top-100-
under-50 UTSA Receives Global Ranking] Texas Public Radio. Retrieved June 6,
2013

UTSA is a member of the Oak Ridge Associated Universities, a consortium of the
nation's major doctorate-level universities dedicated to collaboration and
scientific advancement. "[http://www.orau.org/university-
partnerships/members.aspx Directory of ORAU Consortium Member Universities]".
ORAU. Retrieved May 17, 2013. It is an institutional member of the
Hispanic Association of Colleges and Universities, recognizing its influence and
role as a Hispanic-serving
institution. "[http://www.hacu.net/assnfe/cv.asp?ID=155 The University of
Texas at San Antonio]". HACU. Retrieved May 17, 2013. UTSA is also a
member of the American Association of State Colleges and Universities, an
organization of public institutions that seek to both offer educational
excellence and opportunities to historically under-served populations. "[http://www.aascu.org/members/by-state-and-
territory/ Members by State and Territories]". American Association of State
Colleges and Universities. Retrieved May 17, 2013.

Established in 1969, "[http://www.utsystem.edu/about/history-ut-
system History of the University of Texas System]". University of Texas System.
Retrieved 25 December 2012. UTSA has evolved to become one of the largest
institutions within the UT System. Through an aggressive expansion of its
academic funding, the university devoted over $56 million to research in
2011. Its NCAA record-breaking football team
will compete in Conference USA starting in 2013.

Alongside seven other emerging research institutions, The University of Texas at
San Antonio is currently in competition to become Texas' third flagship university. "[http://www.chron.com/news/houston-texas/article/7-Texas-
universities-pitch-case-for-flagship-1791875.php 7 Texas universities pitch case
for flagship status]". Houston Chronicle. Retrieved June 3, 2013. UTSA's
explosive growth has led the institution to new heights on world university
rankings, "[http://www.shanghairanking.com/ARWU2012.html
Academic Ranking of World Universities]". Shanghai Ranking of World
Universities. Retrieved June 3, 2013. athletics, "[http://www.mysanan-
tonio.com/sports/college_sports/utsa/article/UTSA-campaign-to-aid-bid-for-
athletics-facilities-4493432.php UTSA campaign to aid bid for athletics
facilities]". San Antonio Express-News. Retrieved June 3, 2013. and its
"Top Tier" capital campaign. "[http://www.bizjournals.com/sanantonio/blog/2013/05/utsa-
increases-goal-for-top-tier.html UTSA increases goal for "Top Tier" capital
campaign]". San Antonio Business Journal. Retrieved June 3, 2013.
